short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that allows you to clip things you want to learn and create cards.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for saveall.ai that allows you to clip items using a context menu and send them directly to your most recently used deck. Alternatively, open the webpage in the extension and directly add a card.
